name: Fire Combat Elite Heros
description:
Fire Combat Elite Heros is action frontline modern shooting elite fps commando sniper strike gun shooting game is full of action, drama, thrills, incredible adventures, unbelievable and stirring action game.
FEATURES:
Army Battle zone and Smooth Controls
Superior Military Weapons and wonderful Game play
Excellent Graphics and good Sound Effects
Realistic Sniper Shooting game
Easy and Simple tap to shoot the enemies
3D sniper shooter zone environment
